question: You have had a problem with your neighbor for the past few months. You have not been able to meet with your neighbor to discuss the problem. Write a letter to your neighbor. In your letter: Explain the problem Suggest a solution Say what action you will take if the situation does not improve
text: I am writing to express my feeling about a problem which is created by you. In fact, I can not meet with you to talk about this.

Recently, your children make lots of noise and it bothers me. Indeed, these days I am working at home and need a quiet place to concentrate on my tasks. Moreover, they play football at midnight, therefore I can not sleep until they finish their play.

In my opinion, there are some solutions that should be considered by you to solve this issue. Firstly, you should dedicate specific time to their plays. For instance, you should not allow them to play during the midnights and early mornings. Secondly, you should bring them to the park every day where they play soccer there. Furthermore, there are two parks in our neighbourhood and each one has a proper football field.
I like to solve this problem peacefully. However, if the problem is not solved, I have to complain to the city council.
I appreciate your prompt attention regarding this matter.
